document.docAuthor: Nguyen, Tung T., Nguyen, Anh D., Tran, Binh T. T. & Blakemore, Robert J.
document.masterDocTitle: A comprehensive checklist of earthworm species and subspecies from Vietnam (Annelida: Clitellata: Oligochaeta: Almidae, Eudrilidae, Glossoscolecidae, Lumbricidae, Megascolecidae, Moniligastridae, Ocnerodrilidae, Octochaetidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A comprehensive checklist of earthworm species and subspecies from Vietnam (Annelida: Clitellata: Oligochaeta: Almidae, Eudrilidae, Glossoscolecidae, Lumbricidae, Megascolecidae, Moniligastridae, Ocnerodrilidae, Octochaetidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Amynthas corticus
( sic! ) —
Sims & Easton 1972 : 235
;
Easton 1981 : 49
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
See Blakemore (2002 , 2007a , 2012a ) for more synonyms and Blakemore (2013) for separation of
A . diffringens
s. stricto.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type material.
Stockholm Museum (1947, possibly immature), Sweden .

materialsCitation.collectorName: Nam O & Pham Thi Hong Ha.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Examined material.
5 C ( CTU-EW.052.02 ) Nam O Bridge, Hoa Vang , Da Nang ,
28/7/1994
, coll. Pham Thi Hong Ha.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Cosmopolitan species; usually recorded from temperate and tropical regions throughout the world ( Blakemore 2002 , 2012).

Remarks. The species name is sometimes misspelt as "
corticus
". The taxonomic history of the species is very complicated, see Blakemore (2002 : 157, 2012, 2013) for more details.
